subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Which of the following Sant Sampraday is known for its tree hugging tradition?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित संत सम्प्रदाय में से जिसे पेड़ समेटने की परंपरा के लिए जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Bishnoi Sant Sampraday is known for its tree hugging tradition.
explanation_hi: भिष्णोई संत सम्प्रदाय पेड़ समेटने की परंपरा के लिए जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Which of the following Sants was the founder of Ramanandi Sant Sampraday?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित संतों में से रामानंदी संत सम्प्रदाय का संस्थापक कौन था?
explanation_en: Ramanand was the founder of Ramanandi Sant Sampraday.
explanation_hi: रामानंद रामानंदी संत सम्प्रदाय का संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Which of the following Sant Sampraday is known for its emphasis on vegetarianism?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित संत सम्प्रदाय में से जिसे शाकाहारिता पर जोर देने के लिए जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Bishnoi Sant Sampraday is known for its emphasis on vegetarianism.
explanation_hi: भिष्णोई संत सम्प्रदाय शाकाहारिता पर जोर देता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Who was the founder of Jasnathi Sant Sampraday?
question_hi: जस्नाथी संत सम्प्रदाय का संस्थापक कौन था?
explanation_en: Jasnath was the founder of Jasnathi Sant Sampraday.
explanation_hi: जस्नाथ जस्नाथी संत सम्प्रदाय का संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Which of the following Sant Sampraday is known for its emphasis on animal welfare?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित संत सम्प्रदाय में से जिसे जानवरों के कल्याण पर जोर देने के लिए जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Bishnoi Sant Sampraday is known for its emphasis on animal welfare.
explanation_hi: भिष्णोई संत सम्प्रदाय जानवरों के कल्याण पर जोर देता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Who was the founder of Dadupanthi Sant Sampraday?
question_hi: दादूपंथी संत सम्प्रदाय का संस्थापक कौन था?
explanation_en: Dadu Dayal was the founder of Dadupanthi Sant Sampraday.
explanation_hi: दादू दयाल दादूपंथी संत सम्प्रदाय का संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Which of the following Sant Sampraday is known for its emphasis on asceticism?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित संत सम्प्रदाय में से जिसे तपस्वीपन पर जोर देने के लिए जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Dadupanthi Sant Sampraday is known for its emphasis on asceticism.
explanation_hi: दादूपंथी संत सम्प्रदाय तपस्वीपन पर जोर देता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Who was the founder of Ramanandi Sant Sampraday in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में रामानंदी संत सम्प्रदाय का संस्थापक कौन था?
explanation_en: Ramanand was the founder of Ramanandi Sant Sampraday in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: रामानंद राजस्थान में रामानंदी संत सम्प्रदाय का संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Which of the following Sant Sampraday is known for its emphasis on non-violence?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित संत सम्प्रदाय में से जिसे अहिंसा पर जोर देने के लिए जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Bishnoi Sant Sampraday is known for its emphasis on non-violence.
explanation_hi: भिष्णोई संत सम्प्रदाय अहिंसा पर जोर देता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Sant Sampraday: Ramanandi, Dadupanthi, Bishnoi, Jasnathi, etc.
question_en: Who was the founder of Bishnoi Sant Sampraday?
question_hi: भिष्णोई संत सम्प्रदाय का संस्थापक कौन था?
explanation_en: Jasait Ram was the founder of Bishnoi Sant Sampraday.
explanation_hi: जसैत राम भिष्णोई संत सम्प्रदाय का संस्थापक थे।
